abstract: The stability of NBC Universal during the recession has made its owner glad that it did not sell it off last year.
snippet: The stability of NBC Universal during the recession has made its owner glad that it did not sell it off last year.
lead_paragraph: JUST last year, it seemed a good idea to many on Wall Street that General Electric spin off, or otherwise dispose of, NBC Universal.

headline.main: Move Over, Appliances. Television Matters to G.E.
headline.print_headline: Move Over, Appliances. Television Matters to G.E.
